definition: in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: This study will help improve the management efficiency of Shiyang River, and provide a scientific reference to river basin water resource management.
sentences.chinese: 以期爲石羊河流域水資源有效管理提供科學借鑑。

sentences.english: Villagers built Ruiyuan themselves to improve their children's opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 村民們修建了瑞元小學，以期改善子女的教育境況。

sentences.english: Who would be able to steer the team forward in order to stage a comeback?
sentences.chinese: 誰會站出來帶領球隊前進以期反超？

sentences.english: However, after articling for a law firm in Toronto, his doctor advised him to work outdoors due to his health.
sentences.chinese: 另一項研究表明，囚犯，以期對戶外較少的醫生訪問。

sentences.english: So as to get inspiration from it for establishing "Mental health law" in the future.
sentences.chinese: 以期能對未來我國精神衛生法的制定有所啓發。

sentences.english: Through these measures, reinforcement and improvement of inner-party are possible.
sentences.chinese: 通過這些措施，以期能更好地加強和改善黨內監督。

sentences.english: The authors indicate that single stage bio-film processes have great potential for biological nitrogen removal.
sentences.chinese: 以期說明單級生物膜法的極具發展潛力的脫氮工藝。

sentences.english: It aimed to provide scientific basis for vertical greening of Jiujiang City.
sentences.chinese: 以期對九江市城市垂直綠化工作提供參考。

sentences.english: It may be a new step in theory of road night-space and nightscapes.
sentences.chinese: 以期對道路夜空間和景觀理論方面進行了新的探索。

sentences.english: I hope they can have some real impact on the frustration tolerance education.
sentences.chinese: 以期能對挫折承受力教育起到一些現實的影響。

sentences.english: or keep trading in the hope of resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 或是繼續經營，以期浴火重生。

sentences.english: Politicians show up to receive amulets for good luck at the polls.
sentences.chinese: 政客會來此求得護身符以期在選舉中獲得更多選票。

sentences.english: It can provide valuable data for studying of VA mycorrhizae in China.
sentences.chinese: 以期爲VA菌根的進一步研究提供有參考價值的資料。

sentences.english: By term , by point and by area, it provides the reference function to the Chinese countryside energy construction.
sentences.chinese: 以期以點帶面，對中國農村能源建設提供參考作用。

sentences.english: To obtain excellent flame retardant properties of halogen-free flame-retardant plastic film.
sentences.chinese: 以期獲得具有優良阻燃性能的無滷阻燃塑料薄膜。

sentences.english: It can supply effective technology guide to improve the quality of white wines.
sentences.chinese: 以期爲白葡萄酒品質的提高提供有效的枝術指導。

definition: in order to
to try hard to/to strive to
so that/so as to/in order to
so as to/for the purpose of/in order to
using this as a pretext/thereby
with this/thereby/thus/because of this
using this as a pretext/thereby
to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
to have as its purpose/to be intended to/to aim to (do sth)
variant of 借以[jie4 yi3]
to seek/to look for
as early as possible
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
to urgently need/urgent need
easy to/convenient for
